name: PlaneJam
description:
I just picked up GameMaker a few days ago and had a plane trip I had to take yesterday. I thought it would be fun to have a "Plane Jam" where the only time I was allowed to work on the game was when I was up in the air. I was up to the task, but apparently my laptop battery wasn't, so it didn't quite work out as well as I wanted it to. The lack of free Google didn't help either, but I managed to figure out all the things I needed to. Oh well, at the end of the day, I had fun and made a simple little game. Only implemented feature that I didn't get working was the High Score for the number of asteroids shot.

Controls:

Space - Shoot

Arrows - Move
